Summary: Mimicking VERY large star then into a shapeshifting,sparkly metallic craft with faint light beams
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east on 321 in Hampton,Tn until I had reached my destination near Brown's store in Hampton.I parked at 9:15pm facing West and as soon as I exited my car I could see something larger than any star I have ever seen directly in my horizontal 12o'clock vision,hovering above the mountain parallel to Rittertown Rd in the West.I stood still to focus on what I was seeing was something that could be explainable and when I realized it wasn't,I grabbed my phone and tried to record it.But when I looked through my lens,it just looked like a stationary large star because it wasn't yet moving,so I felt that it wouldn't really show or prove anythng(a decision I'd later regret).I then texted my husband to come out to witness what I was seeing.When he did,the object when from looking like a very large white star to a metallic sparkling shapeshifting object.I can't explain it in words but I have seen similar objects on other ufo videos.That's when I really knew what I was seeing.It started slowly moving from side to side,up and down,but still directly above the treeline at the top of the mountain.Then it started an obvious decent behind the mountain to where we could faintly see beams of reflective light behind the trees.It hovered near the treeline a few more seconds,then disappeared behind the mountain and that was the last time we saw it.I would have recorded it for sure if it had been moving and hovering when I first saw it.I also wish I would have driven on 19-E towards Elizabethon to see if I could have seen it on the backside of that mountain but I had commitments at the time.This is the only time I'm 100% positive of what I saw.My husband is as well.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hampton
